title: notify user by email ux is really poor
body:
notify user by email as it is now just makes no sense, some issues are:
* users undestand checkbox for status toggles and not for actions.
* you can notify several times for the same share when there is no need
* if the recipient have not set an email there is no warning
* this type of feature is always or never so if you want to do it always a second click is needed.
* sharing via client (in the future) can not make use if this.

i see this as a server setting or user setting (maybe even both of them) so you (or your admin) want to enable notifications or not, plus a user setting to avoid receiving notifications from other users (if they are on and you want to opt out from receiving them), that should work with clients / web, it is easier for users to understand and use if needed, leads to less spamming and if the user does not have an email setted there is no useless checkbox in the ui.
